assignment6monsters

Class Manticore

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment6monsters.Monster
      • assignment6monsters.Manticore

  • public class Manticore
extends Monster
    This is the Manticore class object for the Assignment6 Monsters program. Manticore extends the monster class and is only unique in that it can change its clan affiliation (validated within the monster class) and overrides the attack score method when attacking to get itself a higher value. I, Sean Flannigan, student number 000270501, certify that all code submitted is my own work; that I have not copied it from any other source. I also certify that I have not allowed my work to be copied by others.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Manticore(java.lang.String clan)
      basic constructor with random values assigned to most of the object's attributes
      Manticore(java.lang.String clan, int ferocity, int defense, int magic, int health, int treature)
      constructor to allow specific values to be passed in on creation rather than have them randomly chosen.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Manticore

        public Manticore(java.lang.String clan)
        basic constructor with random values assigned to most of the object's attributes

        clan - String passed from FoonLogic class to set a clan

      • Manticore

        public Manticore(java.lang.String clan,
                 int ferocity,
                 int defense,
                 int magic,
                 int health,
                 int treature)
        constructor to allow specific values to be passed in on creation rather than have them randomly chosen.
        Parameters:
        clan - String passed from FoonLogic class to set a clan
        ferocity - int value for the ferocity attribute
        defense - int value for the defense attribute
        magic - int value for the magic attribute
        health - int value for the health of the object
        treature - int value for how much treasure the object has

    • Method Detail

      • getAttackScore

        public double getAttackScore()
        Overriden getAttackScore method, used when a Manticore object is attacking rather than the getAttackScore method within the Monster class. allows the Manticore to attack with 1.5x the average of their attributes. Math.floor used to truncate to 2 digits
        Overrides:
        getAttackScore in class Monster
        Returns:
        double attack score value or 0 if dead.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overriden toString that simply calls on the super class's toString method
        Overrides:
        toString in class Monster
        Returns:
        a String message of all this object's attributes.
